dict.acceptation: 柜台；对立面；计数器；（某些棋盘游戏的）筹码；
反击，还击；反向移动，对着干；反驳，回答；

sent.orig: It can disintegrate the counter-revolutionary forces and contribute towards the thorough elimination of counter-revolution.
sent.trans: 这个政策可以分化反革命势力，利于彻底消灭反革命。

sent.orig: OBJECTIVE To compare counter current distribution (CCD) and improved counter current distribution.
sent.trans: 目的：对改进逆流分配法及逆流分配法进行对比研究。

sent.orig: The lesson of Somalia and Pakistan is that counter-terrorism and counter-insurgency are different things.
sent.trans: 索马里和巴基斯坦的教训是，反恐怖主义与反叛乱不是一回事儿。

sent.orig: Counter Counter 4 is used by digital systems more basic logic devices.
sent.trans: 四位计数器计数器是数字系统中用得较多的基本逻辑器件。

sent.orig: Gets or sets the name of the performance counter category for this performance counter.
sent.trans: 获取或设置此性能计数器的性能计数器类别的名称。
